entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
